mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.equipment_description as equipment_name, sum(t2.up_low_exceeded_count) as count, sum(t2.threshold_up_low_exceeded) as duration, t2.time from equipment_cfg t1 left join (select equipment_id, up_low_exceeded_count, threshold_up_low_exceeded, cast(statiatic_start_time as date) as time from point_statistic_hour where statiatic_start_time >= #{st} and statiatic_start_time <= #{et}) t2 on t1.id = t2.equipment_id where time is not null group by t1.id, t1.equipment_description, t2.time order by id,time
